VPR.A: The heatmap shows a {radial gradient} pattern.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Retention and Diversity or the cell corresponding to Retention and Leadership?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Retention} and {Leadership} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Retention and Skills Gap?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Retention} and {Skills Gap} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Performance and Leadership or the cell corresponding to Workplace Safety and Skills Gap?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Workplace Safety} and {Skills Gap} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.19 to 0.40?
